Antics because he knows how to draw a

ugly as beautiful uh I did like it quite

Fusion of hipop and electropop with a

primary concern is is the music so alone
in the crowd is Oliver tree's shortest
full length LP yet with the core tracks

there's for sure a theme running through
the record loneliness love friends
companionship isolation the record truly
does live up to its title in that sense
and thankfully the singing and
